experience.work: Performed full-cycle software development including requirements analysis, system design, implementation, performance analysis, and optimization; characterized system behavior, improved response times, integrated distributed software components, and followed coding standards in production systems serving 10k+ users

Contributed to large-scale software engineering projects by implementing algorithms, improving system performance, enhancing software architecture, adding automated tests, and collaborating on code reviews and QA processes
